config/packages/ijanki_prometheus.yaml.contents:
ijanki_prometheus:
    storage_adapter_service: TweedeGolf\PrometheusClient\Storage\ApcuAdapter
    metrics_path: /metrics
    collectors:
        http_requests_total:
            counter:
                labels: [url, code]
                help: Number of requests
        http_request_duration_seconds:
            gauge:
                labels: [url]
                help: Response time
        http_request_duration_seconds_bucket:
            histogram:
                labels: [url]
                help: Response times histogram
                buckets: [0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.5, 0.7, 1, 2, 5, 10, 30, 60]
        data_is_fresh:
            gauge:
                labels: [app, section]
                help: is the data fresh
